regen.new_specification: The application shall provide a variety of emoticons for users to include in their messages to enhance expression.
The application shall provide a feature that allows users to insert emoticons into their messages to express emotions and enrich conversation.

regen.absent_element: offering of emoticons for enriching messages
regen.new_specification: The application shall provide an option to include emoticons when composing messages.

label: Display a list of emoticons to choose from when the user wants to include an emoticon in the message.
absence: support of selecting emoticons when the user wants to include an emoticon in the message
